text: @Feargal_Sharkey @HugoSAS @EnvAgency Thank you for highlighting this. Incidents should be published. However, unfortunately the EA is both regulator & prosecutor for environmental pollution? urls.description: Sir James Bevan says extreme flooding in UK indicates urgent need for change if humanity is to survive

text:
